fearReactions.title: I’M ADDING WRONGS
fearReactions.description: I’m mentally adding wrongs that haven't arrived yet

fearReactions.title: I’M FULL OF FEAR
fearReactions.description: I’m possessed by fear of possible negatives

fearReactions.title: IT WILL GET WORSE
fearReactions.description: I’m caught up in inappropriate crippling fear of what could get even worse

fearReactions.title: I’M FREAKING OUT
fearReactions.description: I’m freaking out while also thinking it isn’t ok to be freaked out

fearReactions.title: I’M KEYED UP
fearReactions.description: I’m keyed up to prevent something that may not even be threatening

fearReactions.title: I’M SCARED
fearReactions.description: I’m scaring myself about things going wrong before anything is actually going wrong

fearReactions.title: I’M DEMOTIVATED
fearReactions.description: I’m over-concerned and stressed, which holds down motivation and dampens my spirits

fearReactions.title: I’M TENSE
fearReactions.description: I’m very concerned and tense about preventing future negatives

fearReactions.title: I'M WORRYING ABOUT THINGS
fearReactions.description: I’m worrying way too much about things that aren't even likely

fearReactions.title: I'M WORRYING ABOUT MY BEHAVIOUR
fearReactions.description: I’m too worried about how unacceptable my behaviour could get

fearReactions.title: I’M WORRYING TOO MUCH
fearReactions.description: I’m worrying way too much about preventing things that aren’t even likely

fearReactions.title: I'M CREATING MY FEAR
fearReactions.description: My mind is making up things to be afraid of that have little to do with what’s actually going on

fearReactions.title: I'M UNABLE TO RELAX
fearReactions.description: I’m unable to relax even when I know I should, I’m tense about future negatives
